current_alerts.symptoms: Brown lesions on leaf sheaths, white fungal growth
current_alerts.treatment: Spray Propiconazole 25% EC @ 0.1% or Tebuconazole 50% + Trifloxystrobin 25% @ 0.4g/L
current_alerts.prevention: Maintain proper spacing, avoid excess nitrogen, drain water periodically

current_alerts.symptoms: Yellowing and drying of plants, hopper burn symptoms
current_alerts.treatment: Spray Imidacloprid 17.8% SL @ 0.3ml/L or Thiamethoxam 25% WG @ 0.2g/L
current_alerts.prevention: Use resistant varieties, maintain clean field borders

current_alerts.symptoms: Dead hearts in vegetative stage, white ears in reproductive stage
current_alerts.treatment: Release Trichogramma cards @ 5 cards/acre or spray Chlorantraniliprole 18.5% SC @ 0.3ml/L
current_alerts.prevention: Remove stubbles after harvest, avoid excessive nitrogen
